entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
